title: Padang Bai Snorkeling Escape (Half-day)
overview: Discover the calm waters and vibrant marine life of Padang Bai Beach, a gateway for snorkeling and boat trips.

stops.description: Arrive and snorkel in the clear waters or relax on the beach.
Enjoy a local lunch at a beachside warung.

title: Padang Bai & Blue Lagoon Adventure (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Padang Bai Beach and the Blue Lagoon, with opportunities for snorkeling, boat trips, and relaxation.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy snorkeling or swimming.
Take a boat trip to the Blue Lagoon for more snorkeling and marine life viewing.
Lunch at a local warung with ocean views.
Free time to relax, swim, or explore the area.
